sourcesContent:
import {
    Button,

} from "@mui/material";
import KeyboardBackspaceIcon from "@mui/icons-material/KeyboardBackspace";
import React from "react";
import personalData from "../imgs/personaldata.png";
import {useLocation, useNavigate, Navigate} from "react-router-dom";


const CandidateDetails = () => {
    const location = useLocation()
    const navigate = useNavigate()
    const isAdmin = location.state?.isAdmin
    const token = location.state?.token
    const candidate = location.state?.candidate
    const party= location.state?.party
    const votation= location.state?.votation
    if (isAdmin === undefined || token === undefined || candidate === undefined) {
        console.log('non sei loggato')
        return <Navigate to='/'/>
    }

    return (
        <Grid container direction='row' spacing={5}>

            {/*    margin: "auto",*/}
            {/*    top: 0,*/}
            {/*    right: 0*/}

            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={3} display="flex" alignItems="center" justifyContent="center" sx={{marginLeft:'120px'}}>

                            alt={candidate}
                        />
                </Card>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={8}>

                    color: '#ffffff',
                    textAlign: 'justify',
                    fontSize: '0.95rem',
                    paddingLeft: '120px',
                    paddingRight: '120px'
                }}> orem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur quis interdum augue, et euismod lectus. Ut ac ultricies
                    augue.

                    Nunc

                    sodales.

                    eget</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} display="flex" justifyContent="center" alignItems="center" sx={{

                margin: "auto",
